title: Apex Legends
description: Apex Legends is a free-to-play battle royale-hero shooter game developed by Respawn Entertainment and published by Electronic Arts.

title: Fornite
description: Fortnite is an online video game and game platform developed by Epic Games and released in 2017.

title: GTA5
description: Grand Theft Auto V is a 2013 action-adventure game developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games.

title: Minecraft
description: Minecraft is a 2011 sandbox game developed by Mojang Studios and originally released in 2009.
